other_tests.findings: Bibasilar consolidations, greater on the right, suggesting atelectasis; moderate hepatic steatosis; no focal liver lesions other than a tiny sub-5-mm cyst; no biliary duct dilation; common bile duct measures 3 mm; gallbladder is surgically absent; mild stranding and trace fluid in the gallbladder fossa.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Consolidations are new from the prior exam.
